snippet.title: Flotsam -  Introduction Trailer
snippet.description:
Flotsam is out NOW in Early Access:
Buy it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/821250/Flotsam/

The floating garbage town survival game.
Scavenge what precious garbage you can from the ocean's surface and grow your city while doing your best to survive in this colorful post-apocalyptic world.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PajamaLlama
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pajamallamagames/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/flotsam/
Discord: http://discord.gg/Flotsam
